verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silvanus|strong="G4610"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*, unto the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of the \w Thessalonians|strong="G2331"\w* \add which is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

We give \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w making|strong="G4160"\w* \w mention|strong="G3417"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*;

\w Remembering|strong="G3421"\w* without \w ceasing|strong="G0089"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w labour|strong="G2873"\w* of \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* of \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* in \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, in the \w sight|strong="G1715"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*;
\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0025"\w*, \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w election|strong="G1589"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w assurance|strong="G4136"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* what manner of \w men|strong="G3634"\w* we \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* your \w sake|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w followers|strong="G3402"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, having \w received|strong="G1209"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* of the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*:

So \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w ensamples|strong="G5179"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* sounded \w out|strong="G1837"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*-\w ward|strong="G4314"\w* is spread \w abroad|strong="G1831"\w*; so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w need|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G0518"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w shew|strong="G0518"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* what manner \w of|strong="G3697"\w* entering \w in|strong="G1529"\w* we \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* ye \w turned|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w* to \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to wait \w for|strong="G0362"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \add even\add* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.
